entry.title: 电脑工具软件清单
entry.content:
1. Rufus http://rufus.ie/ Create bootable USB drives the easy way

  2. msicuu2绿色版是一款专业的微软Windows Installer清理工具，msicuu2可以有效删除Windows Installer安装程序中的安装信息。当您在计算机上运行且正在安装新程序时，只安装了部分程序却突然失败，即使再次安装该程序依然失败。这可能是因为您在尝试删除旧程序时因安装文件损坯而引发的问题，此时就需要用到msicuu2了。下载之家免费提供msicuu2下载，需要的用户可直接下载体验。 http://www.downza.cn/soft/264072.html

  3. PSPad - a freeware text editor http://www.pspad.com/

  4. https://www.screentogif.com/ Screen, webcam and sketchboard recorder with an integrated editor https://github.com/NickeManarin/ScreenToGif

  5. Calibre 电子书管理与转换神器 https://calibre-ebook.com/

  6. https://picpick.app/zh/
    PicPick
    一款全能的设计工具，并且这款工具适宜每个人使用
    一个全功能的屏幕截图工具,直观的图像编辑器,颜色选择器,颜色调色板,像素标尺,量角器,瞄准线和白板等等。

  7. Tex Live http://tug.org/texlive/ TeX Live is intended to be a straightforward way to get up and running with the TeX document production system. It provides a comprehensive TeX system with binaries for most flavors of Unix, including GNU/Linux, macOS, and also Windows. It includes all the major TeX-related programs, macro packages, and fonts that are free software, including support for many languages around the world. Many operating systems provide it via their own distributions.

  8. XMind https://www.xmind.cn/ XMind 是一个全功能的思维导图和头脑风暴软件，为激发灵感和创意而生。作为一款有效提升工作和生活效率的生产力工具，受到全球百千万用户的青睐。

entry.title: deepin下启动eclipse的错误解决
entry.content:
启动Eclipse，但是鼠标双击，或者用起动器启动就会出现如下的内容：

A Java RunTime Environment (JRE) or Java Development Kit (JDK) must be available in order to run Eclipse. No java virtual machine was found after searching the following locations:…

解决办法是在终端进入你的eclipse目录，然后输入：

问题解决！

entry.title: Java-jdk12及以后版本下载安装后没有jre的解决办法
entry.content:
以管理员身份打开命令窗口，切换到jdk安装目录，执行

即可。
